elements.name: open the Guru99 Bank website.

elements.name: Test the New Customer functionality of Guru99 Bank when the Manager clicks on the 'New Customer' option to create a New Customer account.

steps.name: the Manager clicks on 'New Customer' option from the menu
the Manager should be redirected to the ‘Add New Customer’ page
the Message “Add New Customer” should appear
the Customer Name field, Gender, Date of Birth, Address, City, State, PIN, Mobile Number, E-mail, and Password should be displayed
Submit button, Reset should be displayed
the Home page Link should be visible

elements.name: Test the New Customer functionality of Guru99 Bank when the Manager clicks on the 'New Customer' option to create a New Customer account.

steps.name: the Manager clicks on 'New Customer' option from the menu
enters a valid CustomerName as "Ahmed", Select Gender as [male], valid Date of Birth as "11-23-1995", valid Address as "123 Ora Street", valid City Name as "Giza"
valid State as "Married", valid PIN as "183822", Valid Mobile Number as "01123123124", valid Email as "ahmed5050@gmail.com" and valid Password as "Ahmed&5050"
click on the Submit button
the customer account should be created and the success message 'Customer Registered Successfully!!!' should appear
the customer account data that entered and 'customer ID' should be displayed in a table
the continue and Home link should be displayed

steps.name: the Manager clicks on 'New Customer' option from the menu
enters a valid CustomerName as "Ali", Select Gender, enters valid Date of Birth as "03-13-1987", valid Address as "123 Ora Street"
valid City as "Giza", valid State as "Single", valid PIN as "123456", valid Mobile Number as "012232785412"
enters an invalid Email that begins with a 'space' or leaves it 'empty' or enter invalid 'format email' as "" and valid Password as "Ali&33"
an error message "Email-ID must not be blank" that related to the Email field should be displayed
click on the Submit button
the new customer account should NOT be created and an alert message saying 'Please fill all fields' should appear
